title: ZenPod Case for Apple AirPods With a Built-In Fidget Spinner
description: The ZenPod case by Air Vinyl Design is one of our favorite accessories for the Apple AirPods. With a built-in fidget spinner, the case adds a whole new, incredibly fun level of interaction with one of your favorite gadgets. The case is crafted from high-quality genuine leather. You can order it in black with a silver or black spinner, or brown with a silver spinner.
